CAP - Static variable in class ej.microui.io.Keypad
The CAP mode.
In CAP mode only capital letters and digits are returned
The value 2 is assigned to CAP.
CAP1 - Static variable in class ej.microui.io.Keypad
The CAP1 mode.
In CAP1 mode is the same has CAP mode, but automatically switch to ALPHA mode after the KEY_UP event
The value 3 is assigned to CAP1.

Constant for caption image.

Value 11 is assigned to CAPTION.

charWidth(char) - Method in class ej.microui.io.Font
Returns the width of the specified character with this font.
The width is the horizontal distance that would be occupied if ch was drawn using this font.

createImage(int, int) - Static method in class ej.microui.io.Image
Creates a new mutable image for the default display and with the given size.
The effect is identical to
createImage(Display.getDefaultDisplay(), width, height);

Creates a new mutable image for the given display and with the given size.

Creates an immutable image from an InputStream.
The effect is identical to
createImage(Display.getDefaultDisplay(), stream, imageFormat);
createImage(Display, InputStream, int) - Static method in class ej.microui.io.Image
Creates an immutable image from an InputStream.
createImage(int[], int, int, int, int, boolean) - Static method in class ej.microui.io.Image
Creates an immutable image from an int array for the default display.
The effect is identical to
createImage(Display.getDefaultDisplay(), argbData, offset, scanlength, width, height, processAlpha);
createImage(Display, int[], int, int, int, int, boolean) - Static method in class ej.microui.io.Image
Creates an immutable image from an int array of pixels for the specified display.
Each pixel value is stored in 0xAARRGGBB format, where the high-order byte contains the alpha channel and the remaining bytes contain color components for red, green and blue, respectively.
